text: Westerfield is a railway station in Westerfield Suffolk, England. The station is a junction of the Felixstowe Branch Line to Felixstowe, and the East Suffolk Line to Lowestoft. The station is 6 km (3Â½ miles) east of Ipswich. Westerfield is a small village north of Ipswich and the station is on the south side of the village. == Other websites == Category:Railway stations in Suffolk Category:Railway stations served by National Express East Anglia
title: Westerfield railway station
